description:
A familiar-looking girl also named Hakuno Kishinami appears. Later, Saber tells the male Hakuno that she`s ready to take on the Berserker once again.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Golden Theater of the Deranged: Aestus Domus Aurea
Maneki Tou Ougon Gekijou: Aestus Domus Aurea
招き蕩う黄金劇場 アエストゥス・ドムス・アウレア
황홀로 초대하는 황금극장: Aestus Domus Aurea
